short.ar: اولین افزونه گوگل کروم با نمایش ساعت دیجیتال و عقربه ایی بر روی نوار ابزار و اعلان ساعتی زمان بر  روی دسکتاپ
short.am,bn,ca,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_4: An extension fully loaded with tons of useful time-related features... But the best part is, it is totally COOL.
short.bg: Добавка, заредена с много полезни джаджи за отмерване на времето... Но най-добрата част е, че е супер ГОТИНА.
short.cs: První doplněk, který zobrazuje digitální + analogové hodiny na liště nástrojů ve Chromu + oznámení hodiny na ploše.
short.de: Die erste Erweiterung mit Digital- und Analog- Anzeige, und mit Stündlicher Zeitanzeige (Desktop Pop Up).
short.es: Una extensión cargada de utilidades para mejorar tu reloj. Lo mejor de ella es que es realmente GUAY.
short.he: ההרחבה הראשונה  הדיגיטלית+שעון מחוגים  על לוח הכלים של כרום+הכרזה שעתית של השעה על לוח ההודעות.
short.hu: Egy bővítmény, tele minden hasznos, idővel kapcsolatos tulajdonsággal. És a legjobb benne, hogy tök vagány.
short.it: La prima estensione che ha orologio digitale + analogico sulla tua toolbar di Chrome + notifiche orarie sul desktop.
short.ja: Google Chromeツールバーにデジタル時計・アナログ時計を表示し、かつデスクトップに時報を表示した初の拡張機能です。
short.ko: 크롬 툴바의 디지털, 아날로그 시계 + 데스크탑 알림에 표시 되는 매 시간 알림 이 있는 첫번째 확장 프로그램.
short.pt_PT: A primeira extensão que tem relógios digital e analógico e, ainda, horas como notificação.
short.ro: Prima extensie care are ceas digital + analog in bara superioara in Chrome + notificari care apar in Desktop.
short.sr: Dodaci su učitani sa tonom korisnih gedžeta za snalaženje u vremenu i organizaciji... Ali najbolji deo je što je totalno COOL.
short.vi: Một tiện ích mở rộng cung cấp hàng tấn tính năng hữu ích liên quan đến thời gian... Nhưng phần hay nhất là nó thật THÚ VỊ
short.zh_CN: 提供时钟、月历、闹铃、待办事情清单以及整点报时等等(超酷)功能！
short.zh_TW: 提供時鐘、月曆、鬧鐘、待辦事情清單以及整點報時等等[有型]功能！

long.ar: اولین افزونه گوگل کروم با نمایش ساعت دیجیتال و عقربه ایی بر روی نوار ابزار و اعلان ساعتی زمان بر روی دسکتاپ
long.am,bn,da,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,et,:
This is not your ordinary clock on a toolbar. This does more than that.

Time-telling is one of the main feature of this extension, and different methods are often prefered in displaying time. In this, you can modify multiple the appearance of the clock, which is located in the toolbar.

Let's take a step further. Why do you need to look for the time yourself when you can be informed with the time automatically on intervals? This extension also provides an hourly notification, which can be configured to even announce the time with TTS.

Stopwatch, alarm, and countdown timer are included along with a simple calendar. 

You can also type "clock" in the Omnibox to quick search your to-dos and alarms within seconds.

== Features ==
 - Hourly notifications
 - If you hide your Windows start bar, you can tell the time right in your browser
 - Editable appearances
 - Timezone settings
 - If you want want to hide the clock temporarily, just check that in the option page.
 - Lots of ways to display the time
 - Details in the popup
 - Includes clock, calendar and digital clock...

== Open Source ==
This is an open source project. Source can be found at https://github.com/derek1906/CoolClock. This extension is no longer in active development, but feel free to contribute to the project by creating a pull request on GitHub.

== Social Media ==
Facebook Page: http://www.facebook.com/coolclock
Tweet it: http://goo.gl/VEhfO

== Legal Stuff ==
"Google Calendar" is a trademark of Google Inc. Use of this trademark is subject to Google Permissions.

"Chrome Clock" has changed its name to "Cool Clock" on 2-2-2011.
long.bg,hu,sr,vi:
=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=
Chrome Clock has changed its name to Cool Clock.
2-2-2011
=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=.=

The first extension that has
 - Digital / Analog clock
 - Calendar
 - Hourly time announcement on a Desktop Notification
 - Alarm (supports multiple alarms)
 - Timer
 - Stopwatch
 - Supports importing calendar data from Google Calendar™ (public and private)
... and more.

Type the keyword "clock" into the Omnibox (URL box) then press "Tab" can search your saved to-dos and alarms quickly.

It is also translated into more than 25 languages.

================================
Help translate Cool Clock:
¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯
http://derek1906.site50.net/works/chrome/coolclock/translator.html

================================
Why clock on the tool bar is not a bad idea:
¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯
 - If you hide your windows start bar, you can know the time on the Chrome.
 - This is so cool that's must-have.
 - Pictures are better than the Windows default clock -- "7:00 a.m."
 - Better font.
 - Timezone settings.
 - If you want want to hide the clock temporarily, just check that in the option page.
 - Requires few memories.
 - Lots of ways to show time.
 - Many details in the popup.
 - Includes clock, calendar and digital clock...
 - Show detailed date and time.
 - Has translations.
 - All about time.
 - Fix unstable Chrome OS time

================================
Features:
¯¯¯¯¯¯¯
You can choose how to show time in several ways:
1. Show the time in a translucent red badge with motion
　　(that red thingy in front of the icon).
2. Show the time on the icon
    - using a analog clock,
    - using a digital clock like the logo of this extension,
　　　- 12 hour system or,
　　　- 24 hour system,
3. Show both "badge"(1.) and "icon"(2.) .
4. Show none of them, or, "Nothing". 
　　(not kidding, you can change that in the options page.)
5. Flips clock, hourly time announcement, countdown timer, alarm (with customizable ringtone), stopwatch, calendar (can add stuff to it and can sync with Google Calendar™) and more.

================================
View my other extensions: http://goo.gl/1PFU
If you like this extension, please give it a five-star rating or go to Cool Clock's
Facebook Fan page:
http://www.facebook.com/coolclock
Tweet it:
http://goo.gl/VEhfO

================================
100% Clean, checked by Softpedia.
 - http://mac.softpedia.com/get/Internet-Utilities/Derek-Chrome-Clock.shtml
 - http://www.softpedia.com/get/Internet/Internet-Applications-Addons/Chrome-Extensions/Cool-Clock-for-Chrome.shtml


Google Calendar is a trademark of Google Inc. Use of this trademark is subject to Google Permissions.
long.ca:
This is not a simple plain old toolbar clock; this is Cool Clock!

The first extension on Chrome that provides:

 - Voice Control
 - Digital / Analog clock
 - Calendar
 - Hourly time announcement (with weather)
 - Compatible with Chrome notification center
 - Alarm (supports multiple alarms)
 - Timer
 - Stopwatch
 - Supports importing calendar data from Google Calendar™ (public and private)
... and more!

You can also type "clock" in the Omnibox to quick search your to-dos and alarms within seconds.

Why clock on the tool bar is not a bad idea:
¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯
 - If you hide your windows start bar, you can know the time on the Chrome.
 - This is so cool that's must-have.
 - Pictures are better than the Windows default clock -- "7:00 a.m."
 - Better font.
 - Timezone settings.
 - If you want want to hide the clock temporarily, just check that in the option page.
 - Requires few memories.
 - Lots of ways to show time.
 - Many details in the popup.
 - Includes clock, calendar and digital clock...
 - Show detailed date and time.
 - Has translations.
 - All about time.
 - Hourly notifications.

[Chrome Clock has changed its name to Cool Clock. 2-2-2011]
================================
Facebook Fan page:
http://www.facebook.com/coolclock
Tweet it:
http://goo.gl/VEhfO

================================
100% Clean, checked by Softpedia.
 - http://mac.softpedia.com/get/Internet-Utilities/Derek-Chrome-Clock.shtml
 - http://www.softpedia.com/get/Internet/Internet-Applications-Addons/Chrome-Extensions/Cool-Clock-for-Chrome.shtml

long.zh_CN:
想要时钟、月历、闹铃、整点报时等等功能? 那么这个扩展程序便是你的选择了!
这是第一个Google Chrome插件在网址列旁加入电子时钟(数字钟) + 指针时钟+ 月历+ 其他功能。

================================ 
为什么在工具列上加入时钟并不是个坏主意? 
¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯ 
 - 全中文介面，设定不复杂。 
 - 如果你把Windows的工具列隐藏了的话，这个就方便你看时间。 
 - 太酷了。 
 - 图画肯定比Windows的预设时钟漂亮。 
 - 设有美丽的字体。 
 - 可暂时隐藏时钟。 
 - 只需很少记亿体。 
 - 三种方法去显示时间。 
 - Popup 中有详细的时间显示。 
 - 包含 时钟、月历和整点报时功能。 
 - 详细的时间显示。 
 - 含多国语言以供选择。 
================================ 
協助翻译 酷时钟︰ 
¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯ 
http://derek1906.site50.net/works/chrome/coolclock/translator.html

================================ 
功能
¯¯¯¯
你可选择使用不同方式来显示时间︰ 
1. 显示时间于图示前的半透明红色框 
2. 显示时间于图示 
    - 指针时钟， 
    - 数字时钟， 
　　　- 12 小时制 或， 
　　　- 24 小时制 
3. (1.)与(2.)一起显示 
4. (1.)和(2.)都不显示(即是什么都不显示) 
(不是和你开玩笑，安装后到设定页看看) 

在popup内: 
¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯ 
 - 数字时间
 - 时钟 
 - 月历 (可于Google Calendar™中拿取资料－私人或公开)
 - 倒数器
 - 闹钟
 - 计时器

另設有整点报时。
================================ 
更新︰ 
¯¯¯¯¯ 
安装后请浏览︰ 
chrome-extension://icegcmhgphfkgglbljbkdegiaaihifce/update.html 
================================== 
附︰这是我第二个写的插件。

浏览所有我造的扩充元件! http://goo.gl/1PFU

如果你喜欢这个插件的话，请给我们一个五星或按以下连结︰
http://goo.gl/Fcqv
==================================
"100% Clean, checked by Softpedia."
http://mac.softpedia.com/get/Internet-Utilities/Derek-Chrome-Clock.shtml
long.zh_TW:
想要時鐘、月曆、鬧鈴、整點報時等等功能? 那麼這個擴充元件便是你的選擇了!
這是第一個Google Chrome插件在網址列旁加入 電子時鐘(數字鐘) + 指針時鐘 + 月曆 + 其他功能。

================================
為什麼在工具列上加入時鐘並不是個壞主意?
¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯
 - 設定不複雜。
 - 如果你把Windows的工具列隱藏了的話，這個就方便你看時間。
 - 太酷了。
 - 圖畫肯定比Windows的預設時鐘漂亮。
 - 設有美麗的字體。
 - 可暫時隱藏時鐘。
 - 只需很少記億體。
 - 三種方法去顯示時間。
 - Popup 中有詳細的時間顯示。
 - 包含 時鐘、月曆和整點報時功能。
 - 詳細的時間顯示。
 - 含多國語言以供選擇。
================================
協助翻譯有型時鐘︰
¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯
http://derek1906.site50.net/works/chrome/coolclock/translator.html

================================
功能︰
¯¯¯¯¯
你可選擇使用不同方式來顯示時間︰
1. 顯示時間於圖示前的半透明紅色框
2. 顯示時間於圖示
    - 指針時鐘，
    - 數字時鐘，
　　　- 12 小時制 或，
　　　- 24 小時制
3. (1.)與(2.)一起顯示
4. (1.)和(2.)都不顯示 (即是什麼都不顯示)

在popup內:
¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯
 - 時間 (以數字形式顯示)
 - 時鐘
 - 月曆 (可於Google Calendar™中拿取資料 － 私人或公開)
 - 倒數器
 - 鬧鐘
 - 計時器

另設有整點報時。
================================
更新︰
¯¯¯¯¯
安裝後請瀏覽︰
chrome-extension://icegcmhgphfkgglbljbkdegiaaihifce/update.html
==================================
附︰這是我第二個寫的插件。

瀏覽所有我造的擴充元件︰http://goo.gl/1PFU

如果你喜歡這個插件的話，請給我們一個五星或按以下連結︰
http://goo.gl/Fcqv
==================================
"100% Clean, checked by Softpedia."
 - http://mac.softpedia.com/get/Internet-Utilities/Derek-Chrome-Clock.shtml
 - http://www.softpedia.com/get/Internet/Internet-Applications-Addons/Chrome-Extensions/Cool-Clock-for-Chrome.shtml
